attributes.action: stay in office and lead the country out of recession.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We support Gordon Brown, and his moral centre, so clearly expressed over his service.  We call on him to see the mission to an end and lead the country out of this global financial storm.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
